browserSupportWarningPortal.heading: Unsupported platform
browserSupportWarningPortal.intro: It seems like you are using a browser or operating system that does not support the features used in this application.
browserSupportWarningPortal.moreDetails: For more details, please see <docLink>this compatibility table</docLink>.
browserSupportWarningPortal.outro: You can proceed and try anyway, but please note that some or all application features might not work.

supportedList.android: Chrome, Edge, Opera or Brave on Android
supportedList.intro: The application is known to work with the following:
supportedList.macos: Chrome, Edge, Opera or Brave on MacOS
supportedList.windows: Chrome, Edge, Opera or Brave on Windows

layout.messageAllowPermission: To receive real-time updates of Credentials, allow notifications permission and reload this page.
layout.messageResetPermission: Something not working properly with the notifications, please reload this page.

loginSignup.fillInFieldsError: Please fill in all required fields
loginSignup.infoAboutTimeAndLocation: Make sure that your date/time settings and timezone are correctly set and accurate.
loginSignup.learnMoreAboutPrfCompatibility: Learn about <docLinkPrf>PRF Compatibility regarding browser/OS support.</docLinkPrf>
loginSignup.learnMoreAboutPrfCompatibilityLaunchpadA: Learn about <docLinkPrf>PRF Compatibility regarding browser/OS support</docLinkPrf> and discover wwWallet via our <docLinkLaunchpad>Launchpad</docLinkLaunchpad> and <docLinkScenarios>Sample Scenarios</docLinkScenarios>
loginSignup.loginLocalKeystoreFailed: Failed to initialize wallet key store, please try again.
loginSignup.passkeyInvalid: Unknown passkey, possibly deleted by user.
loginSignup.passkeyLoginFailedServerError: Failed to initiate passkey login, please try again later.
loginSignup.passkeyLoginFailedTryAgain: Passkey login failed, please try again.
loginSignup.passkeySignupFailedServerError: Failed to initiate passkey creation, please try again later.
loginSignup.passkeySignupFailedTryAgain: Passkey creation failed, please try again.
loginSignup.passkeySignupFinishFailedServerError: Failed to finalize passkey creation, please try again later.
loginSignup.passkeySignupKeystoreFailed: Failed to initialize wallet key store, please try again.
loginSignup.passkeySignupPrfNotSupported: This browser or security key is not supported. Please make sure that your browser supports the WebAuthn PRF extension and your security key, if any, supports the "hmac-secret" extension. <docLink>Learn more here</docLink>.
loginSignup.usernameExistsError: Failed to create user account, username already exists
